sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react'; import { Box, Scene, Sphere, Text, Plane, Sky, Cylinder, Entity, MarkerCamera, Camera, Cursor, Marker, } from 'react-aframe-ar'; import 'aframe-orbit-controls'; const SceneWithAR = ({ images }) => { return ( ); }; export default SceneWithAR;
